description:
Winning the match against the girls’ team should be a piece of cake, but Nao’s tactical abilities — not to mention the value of teamwork — shouldn’t be taken lightly.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Die Sturheit der Jungs und der Stolz der Mädchen
Otoko no Iji to Onna no Pride
The Boys` Stubbornness and Girls` Pride
男の意地と女のプライド
